basic.floral_language:
Delphinium grandiflorum 
Floriography: elegant, light-hearted, upright
Delphinium grandiflorum belongs to the herbs, has a handsome and graceful plant form, unique flower with colorful colors, similar to Consolida ajacis (Delphinium ajacis, Delphinium ambiguum, doubtful knight's spur, rocket larkspur), often be confused, a closer look will find that Delphinium grandiflorum has hairs in the middle of flower. Suitable for flower beds or home.
Delphinium grandiflorum likes ample sunlight, resistant to half shade, avoid direct strong sunlight. Blooms in May-October for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
